dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.root.Role
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that defines the concept of various types of roles used in the DEN-ng model.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Role

child.name: roleCombination
child.description:
A roleCombination is an array of string attributes that are used to identify and potentially select one or more policies for a set of managed entities from among a much larger set of available policies. In contrast with the IETF definition, the DEN-ng definition of this attribute works with a second attribute, called roleSelectionMethod, that precisely defines how the selection process is determined. Values of this attribute should be entered in comma separated value format; white space should be ignored.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: roleCombination

child.name: roleSelectionMethod
child.description:
This is an enumerated integer that defines the precise means used to select one or more entities which map to one or more roles contained in the roleCombination attribute of this object. Values include: 0: retrieve all 1: retrieve intersection For exampe, assume that there is an external query engine that is looking for the roles edge or ethernet. The result of this query will look at the roleCombination and roleSelectionMethod attributes of each managed object that it is querying. If the value of this attribute is 0, then all managed objects that have their roleCombination set to either {edge}, {ethernet}, or {edge, ethernet} will be retrieved. In contrast, if the value of this attribute is 1, then only those managed objects whose roleCombination attribute is set to {edge, ethernet} will be retrieved.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: roleSelectionMethod

child.name: specificationRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association SpecifiesRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: specificationRole
